title: Did Gun Violence Kill More People in U.S. in 9 Weeks than U.S. Combatants Died in D-Day?
subtitle: The Washington Post prompted inquiries from readers with their stark statistical comparison.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: By 6 March, the number of gun-related deaths in the U.S. in 2019 had surpassed the total number of U.S. combatant deaths on D-Day.
